title: Java
description: It make block game go brrr.

fields.name: What is it?
fields.value: Java is a high-level, class-based, object-oriented programming language that is designed to have as few implementation dependencies as possible. It is intended to allow programmers to write once and run everywhere. It was made by James Gosling in 1995.

fields.name: Advantages
fields.value:
- Object-oriented
- Secure
- Dynamic typing
- Exception-handling
- Multithreading
- Bytecode
- Virtual machine
- Platform-independent

fields.name: Code Example
